author: G.P. SHUKLA
title: Flippant attitude will harm the country: Tirupati MLA
description: Bhumana takes out rally for third consecutive day urging residents to stay home
content: Member of the Legislative Assembly from Tirupati, Bhumana Karunakara Reddy, hit the streets for the third consecutive day on Wednesday to exhort residents not to venture out of their homes during the ongoing nationwide lockdown in view of the COVID-19 pandemi… [+1395 chars]
